item.title: Timezone handling pitfalls I
item.description: Timezone handling pitfalls I Short intro of the domain Recently I have the pleasure to work as technology leader on a project that requires proper implementation of timezone handling, over some time I learned, sometimes the hard way quite a lot on this topic. Let us introduce an example domain: task scheduling, the user can schedule a task for an arbitrary day in the future, and when that day comes she can marked it as done.
